admissions.process: Visit any Nationwide office or contact them via phone/social media for counselling, course selection, document assessment, and university application submission.
admissions.eligibility: Eligibility varies by university and program; generally requires academic transcripts, English proficiency test scores, and valid identification documents.

fees.additionalCharges: Processing fees may apply depending on university and visa requirements.

highlights: Direct Partnerships with Top Australian Universities
Multiple Office Locations in India and Canada
Support for Students from Application to Arrival

faqs.q: Do you help with visa filing?
faqs.a: Yes, Nationwide assists with complete visa documentation and filing.
Yes, the institute is associated with RCIC and CRIC certified consultants.

faqs.q: Do you help with university selection?
faqs.a: Absolutely. Nationwide guides students in choosing the right university based on their profile.

faqs.q: Can I get support after reaching abroad?
faqs.a: Yes, students receive pre-departure guidance and basic settlement support.
